stages.name: Training Grounds
stages.description: Welcome to your first battle! Face Schoolboy Siegfried in a controlled environment to learn the combat basics.

stages.name: Advanced Training
stages.description: Time for a more challenging lesson! Face two Little Devils who will test your skills with their resilience and mana-draining abilities.

stages.name: Burning School Gym
stages.description: The school gym is ablaze! Defeat the source of the inferno.

stages.name: School Yard
stages.description: The school yard crackles with heat. Five Blazing Elementals block the path!

stages.name: Scorched Cafeteria
stages.description: The cafeteria has been transformed into a hellish kitchen. Be careful of explosive ovens and flame jets!

stages.name: Molten Library
stages.description: Ancient knowledge burns in magical flames. The books have come alive and seek vengeance!

stages.name: Rooftop
stages.description: The school rooftop offers a vantage point, but a fearsome Infernal Scorpion guards it.

stages.name: Bathroom Fight
stages.description: Infernal Birdie, the corrupted cleaning man, attacks with deadly chains!

stages.name: Principal's Office
stages.description: The heart of the inferno lies within. Defeat the mastermind behind the school's fiery fate!

stages.name: Forest Entrance
stages.description: The gateway to the mystical forest is guarded by twisted vegetation and corrupt wildlife.

stages.name: Ancient Grove
stages.description: The heart of the forest holds ancient magic. The trees themselves will try to stop your progress!

stages.name: Mushroom Caverns
stages.description: Below the forest lies a network of caves filled with toxic fungi and luminescent spores.

stages.name: Crystal Springs
stages.description: The magical wellspring of the forest has been tainted. Purify it by defeating its corrupted protector!

stages.name: Heart of Corruption
stages.description: Face the source of the corruption and cleanse the forest once and for all!

stages.name: Submerged Gateway
stages.description: The entrance to Atlantis lies partially underwater. Defeat the guardians to gain access to the city.

stages.name: Coral District
stages.description: Once a residential area, now overrun with aquatic creatures and animated coral formations.

stages.name: Temple of Poseidon
stages.description: The grand temple still contains powerful magic and is guarded by devoted servants of the sea god.

stages.name: Royal Palace
stages.description: The seat of Atlantean power, where the last king still rules over his drowned subjects.

stages.name: Power Core
stages.description: The ancient technology that raised the city is unstable. Defeat its controller before Atlantis rises fully!

stages.name: Abyssal Throne
stages.description: The true ruler of Atlantis awaits in the darkest depths. An ancient evil that must be defeated!

stages.name: Returning to the Burning School Gym
stages.description: The flames rage anew! The masterminds behind this chaos, Infernal Ibuki and Infernal Raiden, await in the restored inferno.

stages.name: 5v5 - Blazing School Day
stages.description: A full-scale infernal assault on the school! Gather your best team of 5 School characters to face the combined might of the Blazing School Day bosses.

stages.name: 5v5 - Farm Showdown
stages.description: The ultimate farmer challenge! Face all five farmers in an epic showdown. Choose your 5 strongest fighters to prove your worth against the complete farming crew. 🎁 First-time completion rewards a random character!

stages.name: An Angry Carrot
stages.description: A strangely aggressive carrot blocks the path into the farmland.

stages.name: Mutated Animals Ranch
stages.description: The ranch animals have been horribly mutated! Survive the onslaught.

stages.name: Under the Apple Tree
stages.description: A tree that is full of apples. The apples are not normal apples. They are corrupted and will attack you.

stages.name: The Barn
stages.description: You approach the sinister looking barn. Inside, a Crazy Farmer and his Hound are waiting.

stages.name: Crowfield
stages.description: A desolate field with an ominous scarecrow that seems to command a murder of crows.

stages.name: Farm clearing
stages.description: The source of the corruption reveals itself! Farmer FANG stands with his twisted minions.

stages.name: Test Stage
stages.description: A basic test stage.

stages.name: Target Dummy Test
stages.description: A simple stage with a target dummy for testing purposes.

stages.name: Healing Forbidden Challenge
stages.description: Face a quartet of formidable opponents where no healing magic can save you! Farmer Raiden, Schoolgirl Ephelt, Farmer Nina, and Schoolgirl Ayane await in this ultimate test of endurance. Choose your 3 strongest fighters wisely!

stages.name: 2v2 - Boosted Devils
stages.description: Defeat the Little Devils with boosted stats

stages.name: Desert in Hell
stages.description: The endless burning sands stretch before you, where twin demons Hotshot Diablo and Hotshot Diabla rule with deadly precision. The scorching heat sharpens everyone's reflexes to deadly perfection.

stages.name: Infernal Beast Gauntlet
stages.description: In the deepest caverns of hell, five legendary beasts have gathered to test the mettle of any who dare venture into their domain. The air crackles with primal fury as these corrupted creatures prepare to unleash their hellish wrath.

stages.name: Hell Castle Entrance Guardians
stages.description: Before the massive gates of Hell Castle stand two formidable guardians. The stone gargoyle Gargolyan and the demonic HellHorn block your path to the castle's interior. They have stood watch for millennia, and neither will yield without a fierce battle.

stages.name: Hell Castle Throne
stages.description: The throne room of Hell Castle where Grok the Hell Lord awaits with his skeletal guards.

stages.name: Frozen Underground Ruins
stages.description: Ancient ruins buried beneath layers of ice, where fallen warriors still guard their frozen domain.
